title: Fully Furnished Luxury House at Nawala
details:
Architecturally designed four storied luxury house for sale at Nawala
Land extent : 27.5 p
Basement consists of three domestics quarters and wash rooms
ample parking
Three spacious sitting areas
Six large bedrooms with A/C and attached washrooms , walk in closets
Modern fitted pantry and spacious wet kitchen
Dinning area
Studio type bed room with fully equipped modern small pantry and wash room
Bar area
Swimming pool
lift & Generator
Landscaped garden
Sq. ft - 8000
Facing to 40 ft wide road
Solar hot water system
